Description: Part of the side and rim of a bowl of grey marble: consisting of two joined pieces. The exterior surface bears an incised hieroglyphic inscription.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: W. M. F. Petrie, 'Royal Tombs of the Earliest Dynasties' I, 21, 40, pl.IX, 1; P. Lacau & J. P . Lauer, 'Pyramide à degrees IV, fasc. I, pl. IV, 9; P. Kaplony, 'Mitteilungen der Deutschen Archäologischen Instituts Abteilung Kairo' 20 (Wiesbaden, 1965), 23, abb. 46; R. Weill, ‘Recherches sur la première dynastie et les temps prépharaoniques I (Cairo, 1961), 137, (A).
